description.fr:
{%FightTurnEnded} Confère {PropertyEffect:107} aux alliés autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> jusqu'à leur prochaine attaque.
\---
{%DEATH} Se transforme en {ObjectMechanism:646}.
description.en:
{%FightTurnEnded} Confers {PropertyEffect:107} on surrounding\_<sprite name="cell_around"> allies until their next attack.
\---
{%DEATH} Turns into a {ObjectMechanism:646}.
description.es:
{%FightTurnEnded} Confiere {PropertyEffect:107} a los aliados de alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> hasta su próximo ataque.
\---
{%DEATH} Se transforma en {ObjectMechanism:646}.
description.de:
{%FightTurnEnded} Gewährt den Verbündeten in der Nähe\_<sprite name="cell_around"> bis zu ihrem nächstem Angriff {PropertyEffect:107}.
\---
{%DEATH}: Verwandelt sich in {ObjectMechanism:646}.
description.pt:
{%FightTurnEnded} Concede {PropertyEffect:107} aos aliados em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> até o próximo ataque.
\---
{%DEATH} Transforma-se em {ObjectMechanism:646}.
